T:WingandPrayer.MazdaApi.Exceptions.MazdaApiAccountLockedException
member.summary: Raised when account is locked from too many login attempts

member.name: T:WingandPrayer.MazdaApi.Exceptions.MazdaApiAuthenticationException
member.summary: Raised when email address or password are invalid during authentication

member.name: T:WingandPrayer.MazdaApi.Exceptions.MazdaApiConfigException
member.summary: Raised when Mazda API client is configured incorrectly

member.name: T:WingandPrayer.MazdaApi.Exceptions.MazdaApiEncryptionException
member.summary: Raised when server reports that the request is not encrypted properly

member.name: T:WingandPrayer.MazdaApi.Exceptions.MazdaApiException
member.summary: Raised when an unknown error occurs during API interaction

member.name: T:WingandPrayer.MazdaApi.Exceptions.MazdaApiLoginFailedException
member.summary: Raised when login fails for an unknown reason

member.name: T:WingandPrayer.MazdaApi.Exceptions.MazdaApiRequestInProgressException
member.summary: Raised when a request fails because another request is already in progress

member.name: T:WingandPrayer.MazdaApi.Exceptions.MazdaApiTokenExpiredException
member.summary: Raised when server reports that the access token has expired

member.name: M:WingandPrayer.MazdaApi.MazdaApiClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.Boolean,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{WingandPrayer.MazdaApi.MazdaApiClient})
member.summary: Constructs an instance of the MazdaApiClient that is used to access all the public methods.
member.param: The email address you use to log into the MyMazda mobile app
The password you use to log into the MyMazda mobile app
The code for the region in which your account was registered (MNAO - North America, MME - Europe, MJO - Japan)
HttpClient used to communicate with MyMazda
A flag that when set to true caches calls to methods that return vehicles. (Optional, defaults to false)
An ILogger that can be used for debugging and tracing purposes. (Optional, defaults to null)

member.summary: Update the HVAC settings for a given vehicle.
member.param: The internal vehicle identity number for the vehicle which can be found with calls to methods that return vehicles
An HvacSetting object containing the values to be updated

member.name: M:WingandPrayer.MazdaApi.MazdaApiClient.GetAssumedLockState(System.String)
member.summary: Get the assumed lock state of a vehicle.
member.remarks: This method derives the lock state from both the actual lock state that is read from the vehicle and the attempts by this to lock and unlock the vehicle by this api It is required because there is often a delay between locking the vehical and the status changing with the api
member.param: The internal vehicle identity number for the vehicle which can be found with calls to methods that return vehicles
member.returns: A bool to indicate the assumed lock state or null if the lock state cannot be determined
